page.title: 17DAIRY FARMING AT PARKNOWE P1
page.content: My name is Katherine Kenedy and my dad owns Parknowe- a Dairy/Arable Farm.The Breed of cows he has is Friesian. He owns three bulls.He also has 120 milking cows.The give the cows dairy cake while they are being milked. One cow can produce bout 2200 litres a day.My dads milk is collected by the Scottish Milk Marketing Board so he does not know where it goes. My dad has 12 calves because he has sold a lot. They are sold at the farm most of the time . Roughly 160 calves are born in a year. My dad also has 200 other dairy heifers. Some of the illneses that cows can get are - Tuberculosis, Brucellosis,Pneumonia,Mastitis, Hypomagnsemia Milk, Fever,Ketosis, Laminitis,Cowpox. My dad takes cows to the Fife show ,Dunfermline, Angus ,Kinross, Winter Fair and the Highland Show.
